example[0]: Click here, and a list of files will pop up.
example[1]: Her name keeps popping up in the newspapers.
definition[1]: a window, often containing an advertisement, that suddenly appears on a computer screen, especially when you are looking at a website
definition[2]: a restaurant, bar, shop etc that is opened somewhere for a short, limited period of time
definition[3]: a small window containing an advertisement that suddenly appears on a computer screen when you are looking at a website
definition[4]: a pop-up window or advertisement appears suddenly on a computer screen while you are using it
